body:
```
$ spack checksum r-rcpp
==> Found 73 versions of r-rcpp:
  
  0.14.4  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/cladoRcpp_0.14.4.tar.gz
  0.12.9  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Rcpp_0.12.9.tar.gz
  0.12.8  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Rcpp/Rcpp_0.12.8.tar.gz
  0.12.7  https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Rcpp/Rcpp_0.12.7.tar.gz
...
```
`cladoRcpp` shouldn't be picked up.
title: Bug in spack checksum?
